metadata.Title: CVE-2020-20902 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: A CWE-125: Out-of-bounds read vulnerability exists in long_term_filterfunction in g729postfilter.c in FFmpeg 4.2.1 during computation of thedenominator of pseudo-normalized correlation R'(0), that could result indisclosure of information.

criterions.comment: ffmpeg: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
vice: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
